name: Santa's Slay (ink-bleed)
description:
Description:
It's Christmas Eve - The toys are wrapped up and the sleigh is packed. There's only one problem:

A bunch of kids with a serious lack of Christmas Spirit caught wind of your operation and are on their way to steal the presents!

Grab your Snowball Cannon and play as Santa to fend off the kids and stop them from stealing presents! The only problem is, we all know time stands still on Christmas Eve so the night never ends!

Defeated enemies will drop the stolen present they were carrying, and can be picked up by Santa to return to the sleigh. Find mounds (Boxes) of snow to reload your Snowball Cannon.

Be careful! Enemies will increase in strength and numbers over time.
